name: Space Boy!
description:
Description:

Play as Space Boy the space-ronaut! you are set on a mission to retrieve the fragments, avoid obstacles and jump on enemies!

Modifications: 

1- Programmed wall grab and wall climb functionality for player. 

2- Programmed speed-up pickup functionality and made art for it. 

3- Programmed spikes trap as well as made the art for it. 

4- Customized the acid to make it into lava which causes instant death. 

5- Programmed teleportation doors. 

6- Customized the backgrounds. 

7- Changed some enemies to make them stronger and harder to kill. 

8- Designed 2 unique and difficult levels full of obstacles, platforms, enemies, pickups, doors, moving platforms. 

Credits: 

Created by Wejdan Al-Ahmadi
